create_species.title: Create New Species
create_species.description: Create a new species for this world. You will be able to add races

create_version.title: Create New Version
create_version.description: Create a new version for this entity.

create_race.empty_state_description: Create your first race by clicking the 'New Race' button

timeline.create_era_description: Create a new era on the timeline.
timeline.create_event_description: Add a new event to the timeline.

delete_book.title: Confirm Deletion
delete_book.description: This action cannot be undone. To confirm deletion, type the book name: {{bookTitle}}

change_map_image.title: Change map image?
change_map_image.description_singular: There is {{count}} element placed on this map. By changing the map image, all elements will be removed and you will need to position them again on the new map.
change_map_image.description_plural: There are {{count}} elements placed on this map. By changing the map image, all elements will be removed and you will need to position them again on the new map.
